Leaves

Sep 11, 2014

Reading about forces with movement. Here is gravity and wind making some leaves move. Press space to apply more wind force!

Note that I didnâ€™t work in wind resistance yet, so these forces accumulate pretty fast and cause quite the whirlwind. But you can always press enter to reset :]
